svcproc.title: IAH Element (Intake Air Heater)
svcproc.para: A ceramic coiled element located at the front bottom center of the intake manifold. The ECM will command the IAH to be energized when ambient intake air temperature, manifold air temperature, and other functions provide the pre-determined feedback for cold start assistance. Glow plugs are on for a short time to initially start the engine, whereas the intake air heater will stay on much longer or until the Engine Coolant Temperature (ECT) sensor rises to a set value, thus sending a signal to the ECM to de-energize the heater.
